trans-unit.source: Defines the methods that a class must implement in order to support the creation of style rules.
trans-unit.target: 定义某个类为支持样式规则的创建而必须实现的方法。

trans-unit.source: Classes that implement this interface can use it to support the creation of style rules.
trans-unit.target: 实现此接口的类可以用它来支持创建样式规则。

trans-unit.source: To customize the way cascading style sheets are created and registered, you must create a class that implements this interface.
trans-unit.target: 若要自定义级联样式表的创建和注册的方式，你必须创建实现此接口的类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlHead> class implements this interface for use by ASP.NET through the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Header%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlHead>类实现由 ASP.NET 通过使用此接口<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Header%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Adding or modifying styles or style rules programmatically during asynchronous postbacks is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持添加或修改以编程方式异步回发期间的样式或样式规则。

trans-unit.source: When you add AJAX capabilities to an ASP.NET Web page, asynchronous postbacks update regions of the page without updating the whole page.
trans-unit.target: 当您将 AJAX 功能添加到 ASP.NET 网页时，异步回发而无需更新整个页面更新页面区域内。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Microsoft Ajax Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/be84d9b3-b7cd-47d7-8494-be4abfaad9cb).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[Microsoft Ajax 概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/be84d9b3-b7cd-47d7-8494-be4abfaad9cb)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Header%2A> implementation of <xref:System.Web.UI.IStyleSheet> to demonstrate programmatically creating a new style rule and registering the custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Header%2A>实现<xref:System.Web.UI.IStyleSheet>来演示如何以编程方式创建一个新的样式规则和注册自定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>对象。

trans-unit.source: In the first part of the example, a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object, `labelStyle`, is created and then registered for the current location (URL).
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，自定义的第一部分<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>对象， `labelStyle`、 创建，然后注册为当前的位置 (URL)。

trans-unit.source: Then the `label1` label calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.MergeStyle%2A> method so that the `labelStyle` style is applied to the `label1` label.
trans-unit.target: 则`label1`标签调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.MergeStyle%2A>方法，以便`labelStyle`样式应用于`label1`标签。

trans-unit.source: The second part of the example defines another custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object, `bodyStyle`,and sets its properties to create a new style rule.
trans-unit.target: 该示例的第二个部分定义另一个自定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>对象， `bodyStyle`，并设置其属性以创建新的样式规则。

trans-unit.source: This class is intended primarily for developers that want to create a custom implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此类主要面向开发人员想要创建的自定义实现。

trans-unit.source: This example demonstrates the implementation provided by the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示如何实现由.NET Framework 提供。

trans-unit.source: The following is the code-behind file for the Web page in the preceding example.
trans-unit.target: 下面是前面的示例中的 Web 页的代码隐藏文件。

trans-unit.source: The style rule to be added to the embedded style sheet.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到嵌入式样式表中的样式规则。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IUrlResolutionService" />-implemented object that contains the context information for the current location (URL).
trans-unit.target: 一个实现了 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IUrlResolutionService" /> 的对象，它包含当前位置 (URL) 的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: The part of the HTML page affected by the style.
trans-unit.target: HTML 页中受到样式影响的部分。

trans-unit.source: When implemented by a class, creates a style rule for the specified document language element type, or selector.
trans-unit.target: 由类实现时，它为指定的文档语言元素类型或选择器创建样式规则。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.IStyleSheet.CreateStyleRule%2A> method creates a style rule for the specified selector.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.IStyleSheet.CreateStyleRule%2A>方法创建指定的选择器的样式规则。

trans-unit.source: Multiple style rules can be created for the same selector.
trans-unit.target: 为相同的选择器，可以创建多个样式规则。

trans-unit.source: If `urlResolver` is set to `null`, the URL of the current <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> instance is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果`urlResolver`设置为`null`，当前的 URL<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>使用实例。

trans-unit.source: Adding or modifying styles or style rules programmatically during asynchronous postbacks is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持添加或修改以编程方式异步回发期间的样式或样式规则。

trans-unit.source: When you add AJAX capabilities to an ASP.NET Web page, asynchronous postbacks update regions of the page without updating the whole page.
trans-unit.target: 当您将 AJAX 功能添加到 ASP.NET 网页时，异步回发而无需更新整个页面更新页面区域内。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Microsoft Ajax Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/be84d9b3-b7cd-47d7-8494-be4abfaad9cb).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[Microsoft Ajax 概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/be84d9b3-b7cd-47d7-8494-be4abfaad9cb)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Header%2A> implementation of <xref:System.Web.UI.IStyleSheet> to demonstrate defining a new <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object, `bodyStyle`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Header%2A>实现<xref:System.Web.UI.IStyleSheet>来演示如何定义一个新<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>对象， `bodyStyle`。

trans-unit.source: Then `bodyStyle` is added to the current URL by calling <xref:System.Web.UI.IStyleSheet.CreateStyleRule%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 然后`bodyStyle`通过调用添加到当前 URL <xref:System.Web.UI.IStyleSheet.CreateStyleRule%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The style rule to be added to the embedded style sheet.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到嵌入式样式表中的样式规则。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IUrlResolutionService" />-implemented object that contains the context information for the current location (URL).
trans-unit.target: 一个实现了 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IUrlResolutionService" /> 的对象，它包含当前位置 (URL) 的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: When implemented by a class, adds a new style rule to the embedded style sheet in the <see langword="<head>" /> section of a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 由类实现时，它将新的样式规则添加至网页的 <see langword="<head>" /> 部分中的嵌入样式表。

trans-unit.source: This method adds a new style rule and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.RegisteredCssClass%2A> property name to the embedded style sheet within the `<head>` section of a <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> object, and associates the rule with an auto-generated style name.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将添加新的样式规则和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.RegisteredCssClass%2A>到嵌入的样式表中的属性名称`<head>`部分<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>对象，并将规则与自动生成样式名称相关联。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object is rendered using the specified `urlResolver` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>呈现对象所使用指定`urlResolver`参数。

trans-unit.source: If `urlResolver` is set to `null`, the URL of the current <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果`urlResolver`设置为`null`，当前的 URL<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>使用。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object is already registered, it is not added multiple times.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>已注册对象，将不会添加多个时间。

trans-unit.source: Adding or modifying styles programmatically during asynchronous postbacks is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持添加或异步回发期间以编程方式修改样式。

trans-unit.source: When you add AJAX capabilities to an ASP.NET Web page, asynchronous postbacks update regions of the page without updating the whole page.
trans-unit.target: 当您将 AJAX 功能添加到 ASP.NET 网页时，异步回发而无需更新整个页面更新页面区域内。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Microsoft Ajax Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/be84d9b3-b7cd-47d7-8494-be4abfaad9cb).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[Microsoft Ajax 概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/be84d9b3-b7cd-47d7-8494-be4abfaad9cb)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Header%2A> implementation of <xref:System.Web.UI.IStyleSheet> to demonstrate creating a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object, `labelStyle`, and then registering it for the current location (URL).
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Header%2A>实现<xref:System.Web.UI.IStyleSheet>演示创建自定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>对象， `labelStyle`，然后将它注册为当前的位置 (URL)。

trans-unit.source: Then the `label1` label calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.MergeStyle%2A> method so that the `labelStyle` style is applied to the `label1` label.
trans-unit.target: 则`label1`标签调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.MergeStyle%2A>方法，以便`labelStyle`样式应用于`label1`标签。
